query.q: eval(A/1000, alias='CPU使用', A="series_sum(\"M::`kube_pod`:(avg(`cpu_usage_millicores`) AS `CPU使用`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name_k8s}' and `node_name` = '#{node_name}' } BY `pod_name`\")")

eval(A/B, A="series_sum(\"O::`kubelet_pod`:(last(`mem_limit`)) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name_k8s}' and `node_name` = '#{node_name}' and `namespace` = '#{namespace}' } BY `pod_name`\")", B="series_sum(\"O::`kubelet_pod`:(last(`mem_capacity`)) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name_k8s}' and `node_name` = '#{node_name}' and `namespace` = '#{namespace}' } BY `pod_name`\")")
M::`mem`:(avg(`used_percent`) AS `内存使用率`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name_k8s}' and `host` = '#{node_name}' } BY `cluster_name_k8s`, `host`
M::`disk`:(avg(`used_percent`) AS `磁盘使用率`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name_k8s}' and `host` = '#{node_name}' } BY `cluster_name_k8s`, `host`
M::`mem`:(avg(`used_percent`) AS `内存使用率`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name_k8s}' and `host` = '#{node_name}' } BY `cluster_name_k8s`, `host`

charts.name: 集群空间 Pod 分布

query.q: O::`kubernetes_services`:(last(`age`) AS `运行时长`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name_k8s}' and `namespace` = '#{namespace}' } BY `cluster_name_k8s`, `namespace`, `service_name`
O::`kubelet_pod`:(last(`age`) AS `运行时长`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name_k8s}' and `namespace` = '#{namespace}' } BY `cluster_name_k8s`, `namespace`, `pod_name`
